original_text: “that it may go well with you and that you may live long in the land.”

sentences.original_text: that it may go well with you
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 네게 잘 되게 하려 함이며

sentences.original_text: and that you may live long in the land.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그 땅에서 오래 살게 하려 함이라
